title: Hereâ€™s how you can access TuneIn Premium content on your Alexa-enabled device
content:
Live streaming service TuneIn recently announced that it’s bringing its premium subscription service to all Amazon Alexa-enabled devices. Thanks to this, users can now access a wide range of premium content, including live sports, commercial-free news and music, and more, from their Alexa-enabled smart speakers. TuneIn’s Premium subscription service is available in over 100 countries,

The post Here’s how you can access TuneIn Premium content on your Alexa-enabled device appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Here's how you can access live streaming service TuneIn's Premium content on your Alexa-enabled smart speaker or display.
